data.title: Zakat Al-Fitr
data.summary: Zakat Al-Fitr, embodies the spirit of generosity and solidarity within Islam. Itâ€™s a mandatory charitable donation given at the conclusion of Ramadan, symbolizing purification and support for the less fortunate.
